verses.name: Luke 10:17
verses.text: And the seventy returned again with joy, saying, Lord, even the devils are subject unto us through thy name.

verses.name: Luke 10:18
verses.text: And he said unto them, I beheld Satan as lightning fall from heaven.

verses.name: Luke 10:19
verses.text: Behold, I give unto you power to tread on serpents and scorpions, and over all the power of the enemy: and nothing shall by any means hurt you.

verses.name: Luke 10:20
verses.text: Notwithstanding in this rejoice not, that the spirits are subject unto you; but rather rejoice, because your names are written in heaven.
